attributes.action: prevent bonuses to be paid to Northern Rock Employees.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In the current economic climate, we agree it is a crass decision to award Northern Rock employees bonuses when the company has been bailed out by the government.  Most people have faced no bonuses, no pay increases and the threat of redundancy with no new job prospects.  Why should these people be rewarded in this way when their jobs have already been secured by the government.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
